about_the_game:
An RPG conceived as the next work following imayui's long-form retro RPG 'Legend of Yutrepia' (original concept from 2015).
This work takes you on a journey through a dreamlike, mysterious world, woven with poetic storytelling and pixel art graphics with a nostalgic touch."

story
"The Magic Mirror will destroy the world... Someone has told the Ice Queen the whereabouts of the Magic Mirror."

Hearing this, the warrior leaves the dark castle and embarks on a mysterious journey to save the Magic Mirror from the Ice Queen.
He ventures into the Underworld where the Sunken Dreamstone lies, the Land of Light where Prince Hinky and Princess Pimic live, the sorrowful Dream World of Ohom, and the Forest at the End of the World...

feature
  • Play time 5-10 hours
  • Pixel art graphics and sounds with a nostalgic touch, and the entire system are all developed by a single individual.
  • You can enjoy the world of retro games at a comfortable playing speed.
  • 2D screen, top view field, side view battle, random encounter
  • This is a story-driven RPG. Various party members join the party to assist the hero.
  • Weapon proficiency and magic proficiency are available, and parameters increase according to how you fight.
